    • Constructor Detail

      • Wizard

        public Wizard(int x,
              int y,
              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> sprites,
              processing.core.PImage projectileSprite,
              int row,
              int column,
              float cooldown)
        Constructor method for Wizard. Sets default values for velocity, projctile velocity, counter and boolean attributes.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate on window
        y - y-coordinate on window
        sprites - images of Wizard, including images for all directions
        projectileSprite - image of Wizard's fireball
        row - row number on window grid
        column - column number on column grid
        cooldown - cooldown for Wizard shooting fireball

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> allTiles,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Gremlin> gremlins,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Fireball> fireballs,
                 Door exitDoor,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Powerup> powerups,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Door> portals)
        Checks Wizard movement and checks collision of Wizard with other objects on map. Checks if Wizard reaches exit door and triggers level change sequence if so. Checks if Wizard collects powerup and triggers powerup effects if so. Checks if Wizard enters portal and teleports Wizard. Updates counters for fireball shooting countdown. Triggers Wizard movement.
        Parameters:
        allTiles - list containing all tiles on map
        gremlins - list containing all gremlins on map
        fireballs - list containing all fireballs on map
        exitDoor - exit door on map
        powerups - list containing all powerups on map
        portals - list containing all portals on map

      • pressSpace

        public void pressSpace(processing.core.PImage fireballSprite,
                       java.util.ArrayList<Fireball> fireballs)
        Triggers fireball shooting sequence and starts cooldown counter. Adds newly created fireball into list of all fireballs.
        Parameters:
        fireballSprite - image of Fireball
        fireballs - list containing all Fireballs on map

      • releaseSpace

        public void releaseSpace()
        Stops fireball shooting after releasing the spacebar

      • checkHitGremlin

        public boolean checkHitGremlin(Gremlin g)
        Checks if Wizard hits Gremlin and kills Wizard if true
        Parameters:
        g - Gremlin object to check for collision
        Returns:
        true if Wizard is hit

      • absorbPowerup

        public void absorbPowerup(Powerup p,
                          java.util.ArrayList<Gremlin> gremlins)
        Absorbs Powerup and starts Powerup spawn counter. Freezes Gremlins for a period of time.
        Parameters:
        p - Powerup to be absorbed
        gremlins - list containing all gremlins on map

      • endPowerup

        public void endPowerup(java.util.ArrayList<Gremlin> gremlins)
        Ends effects of Powerup and unfreezes all gremlins
        Parameters:
        gremlins - list containing all gremlins on map

      • teleport

        public void teleport(java.util.ArrayList<Door> portals,
                     int index)
        Teleports Wizard to location of next portal
        Parameters:
        portals - list containing all portals on map
        index - index of current portal in list
